summary: "True Detective" is an American TV crime drama with different stories each season. It started in 2014 on HBO. The show follows police detectives solving complex crimes. The first season, set in Louisiana, hunted a serial killer. The second was in California, investigating a politician's murder. The third took place in the Ozarks, looking into missing children. The fourth, "Night Country," happened in Alaska, focusing on a research team's disappearance. The show has won many awards, especially for the first season. A fifth season is being made.
title: True Detective
